timeline.message: Added quarkus.maven.settings system property that can be used to set custom Maven settings file

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            * `maven.settings` (in case a custom version of `settings.xml` file should used for the tests)
          
          
            
            * `maven.settings` (in case a custom version of `settings.xml` file should be used for the tests)
timeline.author: gsmet
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -732,6 +732,8 @@ Most IDEs offer the possibility to run a selected class as JUnit test directly.
 
 * `maven.home` (only if there are any custom settings in `${maven.home}/conf/settings.mxl`, see link:maven-tooling[Maven Guide])
 
+* `maven.settings` (in case a custom version of `settings.xml` file should used for the tests)
